abstract: New York City Council tables proposal to cap expansion of car-hailing service Uber pending further traffic study; City Hall frames action as successful negotiation with company, but mayoral allies and taxi industry members are confused over whether decision is compromise or surrender.
lead_paragraph: After a surprise agreement to table a plan to cap the app company’s growth, mayoral allies, elected leaders and members of the taxi industry were left to make sense of a move that has befuddled many.

headline.main: De Blasio Administration Grapples With How to Frame Uber Deal
headline.print_headline: Negotiation or Surrender: City Hall Grapples With Framing Its Sudden Uber Deal

snippet: After a surprise agreement to table a plan to cap the app company’s growth, mayoral allies, elected leaders and members of the taxi industry were left to make sense of a move that has befuddled many.
